content.rendered:
Punitz-Gubing Airport in Punitz, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : Flugplatz 129
7535 Punitz, Austria

Phone : 03327/2344
Fax: 03327/2344

Email id: info@logg.at or office@logg.at

Hours: MON – FRI on PPR, SAT, SUN and Holidays 09:00 LOC – ECET

Punitz-Gubing Airport Official website: http://www.logg.at/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: NA

ICAO code: LOGG

List of Airports in Austria

Services / Facilities at Punitz-Gubing Airport

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Punitz-Gubing Airport in Punitz, Austria Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Punitz-Gubing Airport in Punitz Austria: (click on the stars below)
